import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import logo1 from '../../images/icons/logo-01.png'; import close2 from '../../images/icons/icon-close2.png'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const HomeHeader = ({ setShowCart }) => { const [isScrolled, setIsScrolled] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { // Update the state based on scroll position setIsScrolled(window.scrollY > 50); }; // Attach the scroll event listener window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); // Cleanup the event listener on component unmount return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); console.log('isScrolled:', isScrolled); return (
